mainHero.title: Welcome to
mainHero.subtitle: EVOLVE
mainHero.description:
A Decentralized Educational and Finance App on the Blockchain
Utilizing Financial Literacy, Learn & Earn & Community Pooling

items.title: Our Mission
items.description:
EVOLVE is a decentralized education and community pooling platform that uses a learn-to-earn model to reward users for building financial literacy.
It is designed to teach BIPOC women budgeting, net worth, financial wellness, and web3 concepts through culturally competent financial learning tools and mindset strengthening for financial well-being. 
The user is rewarded the $EVOLVE token for completing education modules, quizzes and wellness activities. They can deposit a percentage of earned rewards into a decentralized community pool to practice building individual and community wealth through collective investing and APY.

features.title: Our Sponsors and Partners
features.subtitle:

& why
features.description: Strong Ethereum blockchain base with a loyal and vibrant ecosystem, security and openness which allows EVOLVE to trust the well-establish community and transparency for our users.

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the theme.ts file and configure the color palette to match the branding of your company! If you're feeling wild, maybe change some tailwind css as well!
